data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Mudug who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mudug, Somalia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Mudug a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Mudug, Somalia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 104 believers in Mudug.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Somali people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Somali people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Somali people is yours.
Father, help your children in Mudug, Somalia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Mudug to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 104 believers in Mudug, Somalia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
